title: Aufa AI Portfolio & RAG Chat API
description: Built a production-ready AI-powered portfolio with a custom Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system. Implemented a complete DevOps pipeline including Docker containerization, Traefik reverse proxy, automated SSL, and CI/CD with GitHub Actions. The backend features FastAPI, PostgreSQL with pgvector, and OpenAI API integration.

title: Cerina - Women's Health Tracking App
description: Led comprehensive product research using the Double Diamond methodology for a health solution. Designed the complete user experience from concept to high-fidelity prototype, focusing on privacy and compliance. Developed the Flutter mobile application featuring an AI health assistant, Auth0 authentication, and real-time chat.

title: Academic Development Projects
description: Includes a web application with a Laravel backend and Bootstrap frontend, a Flutter mobile app with Firebase integration for authentication and real-time chat, and an interactive 3D environment and map for a game using Unity.
